00012 outfilename = infilename.replace(".hex", ".hex.js")

00014 def write_header(outfile, array_name):
00015     outfile.write("%s = [" % array_name)
00016 
00017 def write_tail(outfile):
00018     outfile.write("];\n")

00021     print "writing block", block
00022     outfile.write('"')
00023     outfile.write(bytes)
